sn36.5:1.3: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana.
sn36.5:1.4: Sukha, bhikkhave, vedana dukkhato datthabba, dukkha vedana sallato datthabba, adukkhamasukha vedana aniccato datthabba.
sn36.5:1.5: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sukha vedana dukkhato dittha hoti, dukkha vedana sallato dittha hoti, adukkhamasukha vedana aniccato dittha hoti—
sn36.5:1.6: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu sammaddaso acchecchi tanham, vivattayi samyojanam, samma manabhisamaya antamakasi dukkhassa’ti.
